  2. Texas man says he smashed Taylor Swift-signed guitar he bid $4,000 on at auction as 'a joke'  Yahoo Entertainment
  3. Texas man pays $4,000 for ‘autographed’ Taylor Swift guitar at auction then smashes it to pieces with hammer  The Independent
  4. North Texas man smashes autographed Taylor Swift guitar after buying it for $4K  WFAA.com
  5. Texas man buys Taylor Swift guitar then smashes it. See viral video, social media response  Austin American-Statesman
